label: Learning Pali
desc: I'm a linguistics nerd and bygone student of Latin who will happily spend hours producing a translation of a dead language. I’m currently learning Pali, the ancient written language of the Theravada Buddhist texts.

label: First Veggie Garden
desc: I’m working on my first ever vegetable garden! I’m planting pumpkin, radish, beet, and okra, among others.

label: Practicing French
desc: I majored in French Language & Literature in college, and the French language is still one of my favorites. I spent a year studying in Paris and eating cheese. I hope to visit the Lascaux caves one of these days.

label: Crochet & Embroidery
desc: I have been crocheting since I was 8 years old. You’d think I’d be better at it… I’m also learning how to embroider! I'm a big fan of yarns that are recycled or sustainably and ethically produced.

label: Pastel & Charcoal Drawing
desc: I love the way charcoal and pastel feel. Tactile media are a true delight to work with.

label: Yoga & Meditation
desc: I am certified to teach Restorative Yoga. I practice yoga, meditation, and mindfulness daily.
